statements: SELECT * FROM criminal_records;
SELECT criminal_name, crime, arrest_date FROM criminal_records;
SELECT * FROM criminal_records WHERE crime = 'Theft';
SELECT criminal_name, arrest_date FROM criminal_records ORDER BY arrest_date DESC;
SELECT criminal_name, crime FROM criminal_records WHERE officer_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY criminal_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM criminal_records ORDER BY arrest_date DESC, criminal_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT criminal_name, crime, arrest_date FROM criminal_records WHERE crime='Robbery' ORDER BY arrest_date DESC
SELECT criminal_name, COUNT(*) as total_crimes FROM criminal_records GROUP BY criminal_name HAVING total_crimes > 1 ORDER BY total_crimes DESC
SELECT criminal_name, crime, arrest_date FROM criminal_records WHERE officer_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND arrest_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY arrest_date
SELECT DISTINCT crime FROM criminal_records ORDER BY crime ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM CriminalRecords WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT criminal_name, date_of_crime FROM CriminalRecords WHERE prison_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM CriminalRecords;
SELECT criminal_name, crime_type, date_of_crime, prison_id FROM CriminalRecords ORDER BY date_of_crime DESC;
SELECT case_id, investigating_officer FROM Investigations WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM CriminalRecords WHERE crime_type='Robbery';
SELECT record_id, criminal_name FROM CriminalRecords WHERE prison_id = 3 ORDER BY date_of_crime DESC;
SELECT criminal_name, date_of_crime FROM CriminalRecords WHERE crime_type='Murder' AND prison_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Investigations WHERE case_status='Open' AND investigating_officer='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Investigations WHERE criminal_id IN (SELECT record_id FROM CriminalRecords WHERE crime_type='Fraud');
SELECT * FROM criminal_records;
SELECT criminal_name, crime_type FROM criminal_records WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT case_number, criminal_name FROM criminal_records ORDER BY date_of_crime DESC;
SELECT location, count(*) FROM criminal_records GROUP BY location;
SELECT criminal_name, COUNT(*) FROM suspects GROUP BY criminal_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM criminal_records WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT criminal_name, date_of_crime, location FROM criminal_records WHERE date_of_crime > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT criminal_name, action_taken, timestamp FROM criminal_records JOIN investigation_logs ON criminal_records.case_number = investigation_logs.case_number WHERE action_taken = 'Arrest' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT criminal_name, description FROM criminal_records JOIN suspects ON criminal_records.case_number = suspects.case_number WHERE criminal_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT criminal_name, case_number, location FROM criminal_records WHERE location LIKE '%Texas%' ORDER BY case_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM Criminals WHERE criminal_gender = 'Male';
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_crime FROM Criminals ORDER BY criminal_name DESC;
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_age FROM Criminals WHERE criminal_age > 30;
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_crime FROM Criminals WHERE criminal_crime LIKE '%Theft%';
SELECT * FROM Cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM Criminals WHERE criminal_gender = 'Male';
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_age FROM Criminals WHERE criminal_crime = 'Murder';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM Cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT investigator_name, investigator_department FROM Investigators WHERE investigator_rank = 'Detective';
SELECT * FROM Evidence WHERE evidence_type = 'Forensic';
SELECT * FROM criminals;
SELECT id, name, age, crime FROM criminals WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT case_name, assigned_officer FROM cases WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM evidence ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT name, badge_number, rank FROM officers WHERE department = 'Homicide Unit';
SELECT * FROM criminals ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, crime FROM criminals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT officer_id, name, rank FROM officers WHERE department = 'Investigation';
SELECT department_name, total_officers FROM departments WHERE budget > 100000;
SELECT case_name, assigned_officer FROM cases WHERE status = 'Pending';
